original: 初為董卓效命，於董卓死後，占領宛城，與劉表聯合。後因曹操納其嫂為妾，而與之交惡，持續至官渡戰前。
text: First served for Dong Zhuo, after Dong Zhuo died, occupied Wancheng and united with Liu Biao. Later, because Cao Cao accepted his sister-in-law as a concubine, he had a vicious relationship with him, which lasted until before the Guandu War.
